Package com.example.ggdurrant.androidphotos79

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Album
    Album class contains name, number of photos, and ArrayList of photos
    AlbumActivity
    controls the individual album screen with a grid of photos and their filenames
    AlbumInfo
    AlbumInfo loads and saves the ArrayList of albums for the user
    MainActivity
    home screen with album titles which can be opened, added to, renamed, or deleted implements a search feature
    MyAdapter
    specialized adapter which returns a view from a photo
    Photo
    Photo has image and filename information and write/read object methods
    PhotoActivity
    controls the slideshow screen of individual photos with options to add or remove tags, scroll
    SearchActivity
    controls search results screen
